org.taverna.server.localworker.impl

Class FileDelegate

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
      • java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
        • java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
          • org.taverna.server.localworker.impl.FileDelegate
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Remote, RemoteDirectoryEntry, RemoteFile

    public class FileDelegate
extends UnicastRemoteObject
implements RemoteFile
    This class acts as a remote-aware delegate for the files in a workflow run's working directory and its subdirectories.
    Author:
    Donal Fellows
    See Also:
    DirectoryDelegate, Serialized Form

      • getContents

        public byte[] getContents(int offset,
                          int length)
                   throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: RemoteFile
        Read from the file.
        Specified by:
        getContents in interface RemoteFile
        Parameters:
        offset - Where in the file to read the bytes from.
        length - How much of the file to read; -1 for "to the end".
        Returns:
        The literal byte contents of the given section of the file.
        Throws:
        RemoteException - If anything goes wrong with the communication.
        IOException - If things go wrong reading the file.

        Specified by:

        Returns:

        Write the data to the file, totally replacing what was there before.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:

      • destroy

        public void destroy()
             throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: RemoteDirectoryEntry
        Destroy this directory entry, deleting the file or sub-directory. The workflow run's working directory can never be manually destroyed.
        Specified by:
        destroy in interface RemoteDirectoryEntry
        Throws:
        RemoteException - If anything goes wrong with the communication.
        IOException - If things go wrong when deleting the directory entry.

        Description copied from interface: RemoteDirectoryEntry
        Gets the directory containing this directory entry.
        Specified by:
        getContainingDirectory in interface RemoteDirectoryEntry
        Returns:
        A directory handle, or null if called on the workflow run's working directory.

      • getName

        public String getName()
        Specified by:
        getName in interface RemoteDirectoryEntry
        Returns:
        The "local" name of the entry. This will never be ".." or contain the character "/".
